pageHeader.description: AI noise reduction for high resolution in dark conditions

model.text1: This technology uses AI to reduce high-ISO noises caused by shooting in low-light conditions, to enhance resolution.
model.text2: High resolution can be achieved in real-time even in lightweight devices like smartphones, where it is difficult to embed large image sensors, and in industrial cameras used in dark places.
model.caption: Move the slider to the left or right to see the image before and after processing.

item1.title: Digital camera (night mode shooting - low noise high-ISO shooting)
item1.text: Effective for night scenes and illumination, as well as for starry skies and galaxies that require long exposures. It can also clearly reproduce high-contrast scenes such as morning sunrises in mountainous areas, and low-angle portraits such as candlelight and people.

item2.title: Industrial camera (for logistics warehouses and factories under dark conditions, improved detection and inspection systems)
item2.text: Expected to improve the accuracy of detection and inspection in dark areas, such as in distribution warehouses and factories. Low-noise, high-quality video improves accuracy and supports efficient operations in processes such as barcode reading and quality inspections.

item3.title: Smartphone (night mode shooting - low light high-resolution shooting)
item3.text: Reduces noise when shooting at night or in dark locations, achieving high-resolution photos that retain fine details. Capture clear images with limited light conditions, such as at nighttime events, parties, and outdoor night scenes.

item4.title: Industrial X-ray inspection camera ( improving inspection system under low dose)
item4.text: In low-dose inspections, X-ray images tend to contain a lot of noise, but AI-based noise reduction will enable more accurate detection of minute defects and anomalies. It is also expected to reduce exposure to radiation doses and speed up processing.

item5.title: Surveillance camera (nighttime surveillance - disaster, nature, port, security)
item5.text: Improves the image resolution in nighttime surveillance video. Clear images with reduced noise provide superior performance in a variety of situations, such as disaster monitoring, observation of natural environments, port surveillance, and security cameras, and enable more accurate video analysis and grasp of the situation.

imageNR.text: AI technology that reduces high-ISO noise caused by low-light shooting to achieve high image quality.

videoNR.text: Real-time, high-quality image enhancement by AI even in video recording where long-second exposures are difficult to use

superResolution.text: AI technology to enhance low-resolution digital images while preserving sharpness

deblurring.text: AI technology to reduce blur caused by camera shaking or shooting moving subjects

deraining.text: AI technology to remove water drops on the surface of the camera lens from the image after shooting

objectDetection.text: AI technology to detect where people, vehicles, and other objects are located in an image

segmentation.text: AI technology to divide colors by object areas

poseEstimation.text: AI technology to estimate the position of human joints and major points (neck, shoulders, elbows, wrists, ankles, etc.) and their connections

classification.text: AI technology to recognize objects in images and classify them
